sentences.en: A voter must necessarily be no younger than eighteen.
Anyone over eighteen years of age counts as adult.
sentences.cn: 凡是超过18岁的都算成年人.

sentences.en: At least eighteen bullets were fired.
Eighteen boats plied the 1,000 miles of river along a trading route.
sentences.cn: 18艘船沿着贸易航线往返于1,000英里的河面上。

sentences.en: He was eighteen years old when he joined the army.
It's not designed for anyone under age eighteen.
sentences.cn: 它不是为18岁以下者设计的。

sentences.en: One good argument weighs down eighteen bad ones.
sentences.cn: 正理一条胜过歪理十八条.

sentences.en: Our class is composed of eighteen boys and twelve girls.
sentences.cn: 我们班由18个男生和12个女生组成.

sentences.en: She dolled herself up as though she has been a girl of eighteen.
sentences.cn: 她把自己打扮得漂漂亮亮,像个十八岁的女孩子.

sentences.en: Six yards is commensurate with eighteen feet.
The age of majority in Romania is eighteen.
sentences.cn: 罗马尼亚的法定成年年龄为18周岁。

sentences.en: The Honduran press published reports of eighteen cases of alleged baby snatching.
sentences.cn: 洪都拉斯媒体报道了18起涉嫌偷拐婴儿的案件。

sentences.en: The regulations rule out anyone under the age of eighteen.
sentences.cn: 按规定,18岁以下的人都不能参加.

sentences.en: Their two faces were hardly more than eighteen inches apart.
sentences.cn: 他俩的脸相隔还不到18英寸。

sentences.en: There are eighteen hairpin bends on the way up Mogan Mountain.
sentences.cn: 莫干山上下都是一十八盘.

words.tran_cn: 第十八的，第十八个的；十八分之一的
